title: Slunch Buggy No Punch Backs
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are in chambers this week because the docket needs to be cleared! They discuss punching your fellow car passengers, laundry room etiquette, computer mice vs tablets, recycling, coffee house mugs, pebble ice, and much, much more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
